Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

getVaultStatus(uint256).details: This function should not be called on chain.

getVaultStatusWithAddress().details: This function should not be called on chain.

params._closeRatio: If you'll close all position, set 1e18.

params._depositAmount: The amount of margin to deposit from main vault.

params._assetId: The id of asset to reallocate.

setOperator(address).details: Only operator can call this function.

params._amount: The amount of asset being supplied
params._assetId: Asset id of the asset being supplied to the pool

returns.finalMintAmount: The amount of claim token being minted

returns._0: TradeResult The result of perp trade

updateAssetRiskParams(uint256,(uint256,i.details: The function can be called by operator.

params._assetId: The id of asset to update params.

updateIRMParams(uint256,(uint256,uint256.details: The function can be called by operator.

params._assetId: The id of asset to update params.

params._marginAmount: The amount of margin. Positive means deposit and negative means withdraw.

withdrawProtocolRevenue(uint256,uint256).details: Only operator can call this function.

params._amount: amount of stable token to withdraw
The amount of asset being withdrawn
params._assetId: Asset id of the asset being withdrawn from the pool

returns.finalBurnAmount: The amount of claim token being burned
returns.finalWithdrawAmount: The amount of token being withdrawn

closeIsolatedVault(uint256,uint256,(uint.notice: Close positions in the isolated vault and move margin to main vault.

getSqrtPrice(uint256).notice: Gets square root of current underlying token price by quote token.

getVaultStatusWithAddress().notice: Gets latest main vault status that the caller has.

liquidationCall(uint256,uint256).notice: Executes liquidation call and gets reward. Anyone can call this function.

openIsolatedVault(uint256,uint256,(int25.notice: Creates new isolated vault and open perp positions.

reallocate(uint256).notice: Reallocates range of Uniswap LP position.

settleUserBalance(uint256).notice: Settle user balance if the vault has rebalance position Anyone can call this function.

supplyToken(uint256,uint256).notice: Supplys token and mints claim token

tradePerp(uint256,uint256,(int256,int256.notice: Trades perps of x and sqrt(x)

withdrawToken(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraws token and burns claim token

userdoc.notice: Error Codes C0: invalid asset rist parameters C1: caller must be operator C2: caller must be vault owner C3: token0 or token1 must be registered stable token C4: invalid interest rate model parameters C5: invalid vault creation
